channel.title: Release Notes - 2020 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2020 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.11. GPU version: 20.11.0 All Features Key Summary Category OCRCPP-151 Extend API with next feature: support the recognition of the multiple images Enhancement Enhancements Added ability to recognize a batch of images (in zip archive or in a folder). Pass archive name or folder name as a parameter and get an array of results from each page) Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes New API Function Description size_t asposeocr_pages_multi(

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.10. GPU version: 20.10.0 All Features Key Summary Category OCRCPP-243 Add the language choose option Enhancement OСRCPP-247 Make an option to set a custom angle for the skew correction feature. Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes New API Function Description size_t asposeocr_page_settings(const char* image_path,wchar_t* buffer,size_t buffer_size,RecognitionSettings settings); Optical character recognition image from file with next options: automatic text areas detection, customer text areas detection or recognize the image as one area, automatic detecting and correction skew of the text or without correction skew.

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.9. GPU version: 20.9.0 All Features Key Summary Category OCRCPP-142 Extended the recognition result and added the JSON-format support Enhancement OСRCPP-141 Added the possibility to recognize image from uri-link Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes New API Function Description size_t asposeocr_page_from_uri(const char* uri,wchar_t* buffer,size_t buffer_size,RecognitionSettings settings); Optical character recognition image from uri with next options: automatic text areas detection, customer text areas detection or recognize the image as one area, automatic detecting and correction skew of the text or without correction skew.

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.8. GPU version: 20.8.0 All Features Key Summary Category OСRCPP-137, OСRCPP-139 New ML model with improved recognition. Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes New API No Changes Removed APIs No Changes

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.7. All Features Key Summary Category OCRCPP-116 Recognizing text in the tables (remove vertical and horizontal lines from tables). Enhancement OСRCPP-131 Add image recognition using GPU and CUDA technology (available in separate assembly Aspose.Ocr.Cpp.Gpu). Enhancement OСRCPP-109 New ML model with improved recognition. Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes New API Function Description size_t asposeocr_page_all(const char* image_path, wchar_t* buffer, size_t buffer_size, bool correct_skew) Recognition image without automatic detection of text areas.

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.6. Aspose.OCR for C (C++) is a cross-platform C and C++ library for optical character recognition and document scanning. It allows you to scan documents and recognize characters. Supported Characters space ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - .

item.title: Aspose.OCR for CPP 20.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.OCR for C++ 20.4. Aspose.OCR for C++ is a cross-platform C++ library for optical character recognition and document scanning. It allows you to scan documents and recognize characters. Recognized text in English charset. Prerequisite Aspose OCR library required onnxruntime.dll in the system path. Recognize charset “EN” Input formats bmp jpg png Aspose OCR API Note: all function in the ‘aspose::ocr’ namespace.
